text: The owners are great people and their food is as good as you would expect. The wife and I have been here several times and have never had a bad meal. Eggs cooked to perfection and the French toast is our favorite.

Our food was good, and if you are a regular, this is probably a great spot. However, we felt a little left out, and our service was a little slow. So, a good diner for a bite, but it wouldn't be a quick stop.
Delicious french toast, western omelette and great customer service. Will keep coming back.
